ol.li: Run the Java application through the Xhn GUI (org.primordion.xholon.app.Xhn.java), and select File --> Open --> OrNodeSample --> OrNodeSample_xhn.xml.
Expand the Controller node in the tree.
You should see the words "Hello World" displayed five times in the console window (see below), with the word "World" in five different languages.

section.source: Hello World ! Hello Monde ! Hello Mondo ! Hello Welt ! Hello Mir !

section.title: Extending the model
section.p: This is a very simple model that can be extended in many ways.
